mapper.insert: INSERT INTO projects (name, description, repo_url, status, members, contribution_score, total_commits, total_pull_requests, total_issues, user_id, created_at, last_updated) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{repoUrl}, #{status}, #{members}, #{contributionScore}, #{totalCommits}, #{totalPullRequests}, #{totalIssues}, #{userId}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE projects SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, repo_url = #{repoUrl}, status = #{status}, members = #{members}, contribution_score = #{contributionScore}, total_commits = #{totalCommits}, total_pull_requests = #{totalPullRequests}, total_issues = #{totalIssues}, last_updated = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM projects WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
